postal2_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = +56 73 | iso_code = | registration_plate = | website = Municipality of Antofagasta | footnotes = }} Antofagasta is a city in northern Chile. It is the capital of the province of Antofagasta and of the region of Antofagasta. In the 2002 census, the city had a population of 296,905. ==References== == Other websites == * Municipality of Antofagasta * EXPONOR – The most important trade fair of copper mining in the world. * MSN Map of Antofagasta Category:Capitals of Chilean regions
